content.rendered:
Directed by Sandra Mitrovic. Milan Todorovic. Dean Devlin. Milan Konjevic.

Written by Dean Devlin. Dean Devlin. Kendall Lampkin. Kendall Lampkin. Rebecca Rosenberg. Rebecca Rosenberg. Jonathan Glassner. John-Paul Nickel.

Cast Reece Ritchie (Spencer Lane). Richard Fleeshman (James Brice). Stacey Read (Alicia Nevins). Ryan Adams (Angus Medford). Pavle Jerinic (Felix Strickland). Shalini Peiris (Dr. Sanjivni Kabir). Christina Wolfe (Cat Brandice). Tiana Upcheva (Eva Markovic). Steven William Moore (William Mulcahy). Tamara Radovanovic (Jelena Griff). Michael Stokey (Albert Stein). Milos Cvetkovic (Sasha Novak). Cosmo Kay (Nathan Stark). Tanasije Cakic (Florian Rupnik). Jelena Moore (Stella Cogner). Jessica Yemi (Naomi Spencer). Miles Barrow (Baylor Trent). Lisa Brenner (Susan Ingram). Domin/Epik Cicak (Harris Beckner). Chris Leask (Jasper Dades). Paul Leonard Murray (William Trust). Mercedes De La Cruz (Attractive Latina Woman). Milica Vrzic (Reporter). Ebony Feare (Grace Nevins). Arsenije Beric (Ralph Gregor). Relja Jankovic (Scholnick). Boris Lukman (Vito Mordi). Andrej Momcilov (Brother). Ana Sofrenovic (Captain Samantha Lester). Davor Perunovic (Robert). Cecilia Eshun (Sister). Jonathan English (Dr. Edward Hall). Lesmay Djakovacki (Mother). Greg De Cuir (Father). Nenad Todorovic (Worker)

Language English.

Producers Dean Devlin. Jonathan English. Jonathan Glassner. Steven A. Lee. John-Paul Nickel. Rachel Olschan. Marc Roskin. Mark Franco. Natasa Ivic. Michael Wright.

Production Balkanic Media. Electric Entertainment. PFI Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 7

Status OnGoing (2023–)
